title: Can I take the CPA exam while I’m still in school? - Quora

response.answer_text: Are you in school for your masters or bachelors degree? In depends upon the state but most states I believe require you to at least have your bachelors degree done with 120 credit hours before you sit to take the CPA exam. W From personal experience though I would recommend getting your education done before sitting for the CPA exam. It is just easier to focus that way. Additionally, if you are looking for a CPA review course I personally used Roger CPA review and I cannot recommend them enough as they were instrumental in helping me pass the exam.
